title: Profile Save Offline/Error Feedback
description: Implemented clearer offline/error feedback for local profile save, then reverted per request:js/early-functions.js:534â538 updated to differentiate offline vs sync-failed messages; later restored original behavior.

title: Implement User Data Persistence
description: Updated profile writes to private repo:js/backend-api.js:updateUserProfile now creates/updates EventCall-Data/users/<username>.json. RSVP writes:js/backend-api.js:339â451 writes to EventCall-Data/rsvps/<eventId>.json (create/update with proper sha).

title: Events/RSVP Loading via GitHub API
description: Removed local fallback and load events via GitHub API:js/user-rsvps.js:getEventForRSVP uses githubAPI.loadEvents() instead of events-index.json. js/user-rsvps.js:displayUserRSVPs preloads events for lookups.

title: Persist Special Tab After Seat Assignment
description: Persist Special tab after seat assignment:js/event-manager.js:2689 sets manage_active_tab='special' before refresh. js/event-manager.js:570â663 restores overview subtabs only when Overview is active.

title: Seating Action Delegation and Error Handling
description: Added robust action delegation and error handling for seating: Exact data-action selector and .catch() on refresh: js/event-manager.js:3291, 3318â3322.

title: Background Save Reliability and Sync Banner
description: Added non-intrusive sync banner with retry/backoff for seating saves:js/event-manager.js:3181â3210 _showSyncBanner, _hideSyncBanner, and backoff retry chain.

title: Validation UX - Hide Errors Until Submit
description: Hide errors until submit click; keep realtime validation silent until then:js/form-ux.js:24â33, 86â100, 140â184 gating and validateForm with submit handlers. Keeps summary and inline errors off until user clicks Sign In/Register.

title: Date Formatting Safe Guards
description: Safe guards for empty/invalid dates with locale-respecting output:js/utils.js:24â43 returns '' on empty, Invalid Date on bad parse.

title: Implement Clear Local Cache Helpers
description: Added helpers:js/utils.js:297+ clearLocalData() (local/session/IndexedDB). js/utils.js:320+ clearAppData() (Cache API, unregister SW, reload).

title: UI Styling Improvements (Profile/Seating)
description: Profile inputs/selects darkened for contrast:styles/styles.css:53+ text color #111, placeholder #374151, select background #fff. Seating empty-state heading improved visibility:styles/seating-chart.css:390+ gold color, heavier weight, subtle text shadow.

description: Crate tables for accounts, events, rsvp, and custom questions.
